name: Kashamari
description:
You are a Wizards spirit, summoned by a dragon to collect it a horde of gold.

Control a swarm of gold bags, expand and satisy the dragon.

Avoid the Rolly roll the Rolling Troll...

60s gameplay video here:(recommend to play the game instead of watching it)


Controls:

WSAD - move

Space - Contract

LCrtl - relax

mouse - look around

mousewheel - zoom camera

GamePad Controls

sticks - move/look

LT - relax

RT - contract

L/R shoulder - zoom camera

ESC or alt+f4 to quit

( banner donated by @hotkeygames )

( troll voice recorded from actual troll )
